filePath.description: FilePath is the path to the tar file to extract.

outPath.description: OutPath is the path to the destination directory where contents will be extracted.

stripComponents.description: StripComponents is the number of leading components to strip from file names in the archive.

ignore.description: Ignore is a (multiline) string of glob patterns to ignore when extracting files. It accepts the same syntax as .gitignore files.
